data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: NE RPC
relatedRecords.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!

relatedRecords.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
relatedRecords.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!

relatedRecords.name: NDC TechTown 2020 - Online Workshop Event
relatedRecords.description: NDC TechTown 31 Aug - 3 Sept 2020. Conference for software developers focusing on software development for products. IoT /Embedded /C++ . NDC TechTown 2020 is a 4 day event with workshops 31 Aug-1 Sept, followed by a 2 day conference 2-3 September. Both the workshops and the conference will be held …
